answerText: velocity field[10] This term describes flow for which the divergence of the velocity field is zero. Fluids described by this term maintain a constant density within an infinitesimal control volume that moves with the same velocity as the flow.
heading: ICCS |2014 | 1 | 18 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: The curl of this quantity is zero when the flow it describes is irrotational. [10] Identify this vector quantity from fluid mechanics whose curl in general is the vorticity.
